name: Plaza
description: A large open square in the heart of the settlement; adventurers can witness public announcements, attend festivals, or use the space for gatherings and celebrations.
atmosphere: The plaza has a vibrant, communal atmosphere with the sound of public gatherings and the scent of festival foods and celebration. The air carries the promise of community events and the essential nature of public space, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of social connection and the excitement of shared experiences.
